    • Constructor Detail

      • Init

        public Init(Namespace namespace,
            String indexName,
            S start,
            S end)
        Build a range query.

        Returns all objects in Riak that have an index value in the specified range.

        Parameters:
        namespace - the namespace for this query.
        indexName - the indexname
        start - the start index value
        end - the end index value

      • Init

        public Init(Namespace namespace,
            String indexName,
            S match)
        Build a match query.

        Returns all objects in Riak that have an index value matching the one supplied.

        Parameters:
        namespace - the namespace for this query
        indexName - the index name
        match - the index value.

      • Init

        public Init(Namespace namespace,
            String indexName,
            byte[] coverageContext)
        Build a cover query.

        Returns all objects in Riak related to the provided coverageContext.

        Parameters:
        namespace - the namespace for this query
        indexName - the index name
        coverageContext - the cover context. An opaque binary received from coverage context entry to be sent back to Riak for receiving appropriate data.

        Set the continuation for this query.

        The continuation is returned by a previous paginated query.

        Returns:

      • withMaxResults

        public T withMaxResults(Integer maxResults)
        Set the maximum number of results returned by the query.
        Parameters:
        maxResults - the number of results.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withKeyAndIndex

        public T withKeyAndIndex(boolean returnBoth)
        Set whether to return the index keys with the Riak object keys. Setting this to true will return both the index key and the Riak object's key. The default is false (only to return the Riak object keys).
        Parameters:
        returnBoth - true to return both index and object keys, false to return only object keys.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withPaginationSort

        public T withPaginationSort(boolean orderByKey)
        Set whether to sort the results of a non-paginated 2i query.

        Setting this to true will sort the results in Riak before returning them.

        Note that this is not recommended for queries that could return a large result set; the overhead in Riak is substantial.

        Parameters:
        orderByKey - true to sort the results, false to return as-is.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withRegexTermFilter

        public T withRegexTermFilter(String filter)
        Set the regex to filter result terms by for this query.
        Parameters:
        filter - the regex to filter terms by.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withTimeout

        public T withTimeout(int timeout)
        Set the Riak-side timeout value.

        By default, riak has a 60s timeout for operations. Setting this value will override that default for both the fetch and store operation.

        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout in milliseconds
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withCoverageContext

        public T withCoverageContext(byte[] coverageContext)
        Set the cover context for the local read
        Parameters:
        coverageContext - the cover context. An opaque binary received from coverage context entry to be sent back to Riak for receiving appropriate data.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withReturnBody

        protected T withReturnBody(boolean returnBody)
        Set whether to return the object values with the Riak object keys. It has protected access since, due to performance reasons, it might be used only for the Full Bucket Read
        Parameters:
        returnBody -
        Returns:
